title: MBMBaM 619: Great Stuff You Can Do in the Bathroom
description:
It’s a callback to the 90s, with answers to the terrible question “What’s up?,” dated commercial taglines, and bootleg Big Bad Beetleborgs. With featured guest, Justin’s new sound board!

Suggested talking points: Vitamin D, The Snyder’s Cut, Time Zone Denial, Toilet Buddy, Sandwich By Number, Promote Chicken Platform

Trans Youth Equality Foundation: https://www.transyouthequality.org/
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Travis McElroy, Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy)
